scenario.name: queue-test
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:100@172.18.0.2 SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "291234567" <sip:291234567@172.18.0.2>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:100@172.18.0.2> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 INVITE Contact: <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=user1 53655765 2353687637 IN IP4 [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP4 [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000

ACK sip:100@172.18.0.2 SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "291234567" <sip:291234567@172.18.0.2>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:100@172.18.0.2>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0

BYE sip:100@172.18.0.2 SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/UDP [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "291234567" <sip:291234567@172.18.0.2>;tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: <sip:100@172.18.0.2>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 BYE Contact: <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0
